quick_answer.text: One tablespoon of regular mayo provides about 94 kcal, primarily from fat.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with product packaging.

tweaks.label: Homemade with olive oil (vs. vegetable oil base)

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 tbsp of mayo?
faqs.a: About 94 kcal for regular full-fat mayonnaise.
Yes, 1 tbsp has 10.3 g total fat, including 1.5 g saturated.
Typically 40-50 kcal per tbsp, reduced by using less oil and more water/emulsifiers.

faqs.q: Does mayo have carbs or protein?
faqs.a: Minimal: 0.6 g carbs and 0.1 g protein per tbsp.

faqs.q: How does brand affect calories in mayo?
faqs.a: Brands vary; full-fat is 90-100 kcal/tbsp, while reduced-fat options are lower.
